dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 293 IH: Making Agricultural Products Locally Essential (MAPLE) Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Langworthy (for himself and Mr. Courtney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To expand the seniors farmers’ market program to include maple syrup.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Making Agricultural Products Locally Essential (MAPLE) Act.

section.header: Expansion of the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program
section.text: Section 4402(b)(1) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 3007(b)(1)) is amended by striking and herbs and inserting herbs, and maple syrup.
